summary: Completed comprehensive testing of UI/UX enhancements. Fixed critical bug: missing 'secrets' import in server.py causing email update to fail. All 6 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified all features working correctly: Password change on first login, Client user email editing with notification flow, Interview pipeline filtering, and Back to Dashboard navigation.
seed_data_creation: Created test clients and users for testing. All test data prefixed with 'TEST_' for easy cleanup.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All UI/UX enhancements tested and working. Password change flow, client user email editing, interview pipeline filtering, and navigation all verified.

backend_api_tests.POST /api/auth/change-password: PASS - Password change clears must_change_password flag
backend_api_tests.POST /api/auth/change-password (wrong pa: PASS - Returns 400 for wrong current password
backend_api_tests.PUT /api/clients/{client_id}/users/{emai: PASS - Email change triggers password reset
PASS - Name-only update doesn't reset password

frontend_tests.Password Change Dialog: PASS - Shows on first login for new users with must_change_password=True
frontend_tests.Dashboard: PASS - Shows Interview Pipeline section with status cards
frontend_tests.Interview Pipeline Filtering: PASS - Clicking status card navigates to /interviews?status={status}
frontend_tests.Interviews List Page: PASS - Shows filtered interviews based on URL status parameter
frontend_tests.Client Detail Page: PASS - Shows Company Information and Client Users
frontend_tests.Edit User Dialog: PASS - Shows Email, Name, Phone fields with email change warning

bug_fixed.description: Missing 'secrets' import in server.py causing NameError when updating client user email
bug_fixed.impact: Email update for client users was failing with 500 Internal Server Error

client_user_email_editing.description: Client user email can be updated, triggers welcome email with new temp password

client_user_create_welcome_email.description: Creating client user sets must_change_password=True and triggers welcome email

password_change_endpoint.description: Password change endpoint clears must_change_password flag

password_change_dialog_on_login.description: Password Change Required dialog appears for users with must_change_password=True

back_to_dashboard_navigation.description: Back to Dashboard button navigates to /dashboard from all pages

interview_pipeline_filtering.description: Interview pipeline cards navigate to /interviews?status={status} with correct status values

mocked_apis.email_sending: Email sending via Pica API - may not actually send in test environment but API calls are made
